profile:
We are qualified full-service HVAC and Electrical Contractor, providing optimum Heating, Air Conditioning, Indoor Air Quality and Electrical Services to residents of Toronto since 1997. 
Our electricians are Master Electricians and our HVAC technicians are natural gas, propane and oil certified.
When you work with us, you have confidence that all installation, replacements and repairs carried out to comply with manufacturer instructions, and all the regulations with regard to Electrical(ESA), and Gas & Refrigeration(TSSA) are taken into account.

For more than 20 years, we build our business trust and reputation, by providing the best products and services to our clients. We design fully customized Heating, Cooling and Electrical solutions for every customer, providing the best match for your needs and budget.
If you are interested to get your new heating or cooling system with easy and low monthly payment plans, we are partner with Financeit, which is a leading company in financing.

Call (416)-822-9030
Whether you live in a heritage home or a newly built home, you can trust House Depot Home Services for the best results for your ultimate satisfaction.

profile:
Lorion Electric Inc. 416-948-3266
Please email: info@lorionelectric.com
Website: www.lorionelectric.com

Lorion Electric is a family owned and operated company and we understand the importance of feeling safe and secure within your home.

With over 10 years experience, Lorion Electric is a full service licensed and insured residential and commercial electrical company, strategically located in Milton, serving the Greater Toronto Area.  We provide greatest value for our customers through the quality of services, cost control, project management and customer satisfaction and we pride ourselves on building long lasting customer relationships.

There is no greater satisfaction for us then providing superior work for our customers. We not only make sure that we complete the job to the highest of standards, we walk away knowing that our customers feel that there is no other electrical solution out there greater than what Lorion Electric has to offer. 

Our team is committed to you and we strive to maintain our proud reputation as your leading choice for electricians.

Lorion Electric offers: Troubleshooting & Repair-- New Home Wiring--Hot Tub & Pool Wiring--Outlet Wiring--Code Violation Corrections--Recessed Lighting Installation--Ceiling & Exhaust Fan Installation--Landscape Lighting Installation--Dimmer--Outlet & Switch Installation--Circuit Breaker & Panel Replacement-Service Upgrades 100, 200 & 400 amp--Pot Lights--Fans & Chandeliers Installations--Knob & Tube Replacement--Rewiring & Repairs--Service Calls--Generator Installation--Fluorescent Light Installation--Under Cabinet Light Installation--Custom Electrical Installation--Additional Circuits & Outlets--Commercial Electrical Services--Industrial Electrical Services

When you choose iELECTRIC INC., our qualified electricians will guarantee a professional service, which will surpass your expectations!
